CreditCard: Field must contain valid card number
EmailAddress: Field must contain valid e-mail address
FileExtensions: Field can contain only files with the following extensions: {1}
MaxLength: Field can have maximum of {1} characters
MinLength: Field must have minimum of {1} character
Phone: Field must contain a valid phone number
Range: Field must contain value from {1} to {2}
RegularExpression: Field must contain value conforming to regular expression '{1}'
StringLength: Field must be from {2} to {1} characters long
Url: Field must contain valid HTTP, HTTPS or FTP address
